thread.title: The Raspberry Pi Zero Wireless Adds Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to the Zero, Costs $10
thread.title_full: The Raspberry Pi Zero Wireless Adds Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to the Zero, Costs $10

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: The Raspberry Pi Zero Wireless Adds Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to the Zero, Costs $10
text:
Go to permalink 
The Raspberry Pi Zero is a fantastic, miniature version of the Raspberry Pi that shrinks the board down to about the size of a stick of gum, but one problem with it is the lack of wireless features. The Raspberry Pi Zero is a new version that packs in Bluetooth and Wi-Fi for double the price of the original Zero. The Raspberry Pi Zero Is a $5 Computer the Size of a Stick of Gum The Raspberry Pi Zero Is a $5 Computer the Size of a Stick of Gum The Raspberry Pi Zero Is a $5 Computer the Size… The Raspberry Pi has long been one of the best credit card sized computers, but today a new version … Read more Read more 
The Raspberry Pi Zero Wireless comes with most of the same specs as the standard Pi Zero, but adds in the same 802.11n Wireless LAN and Bluetooth that the Raspberry Pi 3 has . The CPU and RAM are the same as the standard Pi Zero, which are essentially the same as the earliest Raspberry Pi 1 models. Here’s a breakdown of the full specs on the Raspberry Pi Zero Wireless: Advertisement
